meanings.definition: A person who determines the sex of animals.
meanings.sent1: The sexers at the farm help identify if the animals are male or female.
meanings.sent2: The sexers play a crucial role in ensuring the proper breeding of livestock.
meanings.sent3: The sexers had a competition to see who could guess the gender of the most animals correctly.
meanings.sent4: The skill of the sexers is like uncovering hidden secrets within the animal kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The sexers use their expertise to unravel the mysteries of animal genders.

meanings.definition: Those who engage in the act of determining the sex of animals.
meanings.sent1: The team of sexers worked together to accurately identify the genders of the animals.
meanings.sent2: It takes a trained eye to be one of the sexers on the farm.
meanings.sent3: The sexers celebrated a successful day of gender identification with a small party.
meanings.sent4: The dedication of the sexers ensures the well-being of the animal population.
meanings.sent5: The sexers' job is like solving a fascinating puzzle every day.
